data.comment: The big names in today's match at Jeonju World Cup Stadium have now been confirmed.
The whistle has gone to start the match.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
In Jeonju, Lee Seung-ki of Jeonbuk is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 3, Jeonbuk needs to be cautious. Gwangju have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Son Jun-ho gives Jeonbuk a 1-0 lead in Jeonju.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
Ji-eum Jo signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Gwangju at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Ji-eum Jo awards the away team a throw-in.
Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 12, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gwangju advance rapidly upfield but Ji-eum Jo blows for offside.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 15, Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
In Jeonju, Gustavo (Jeonbuk) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Jeonju.
In the minute 17, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Jeonbuk to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 19, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Ji-eum Jo awards Gwangju a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Goal! Jeonbuk extend their lead to 2-0 through Takahiro Kunimoto.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Jeonbuk will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gwangju.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Jeonbuk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Jeonbuk's half?
Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Gwangju just outside Jeonbuk's area.
In the minute 37, Gwangju drive upfield and Yeo Reum gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Jeonbuk defender.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
In the minute 38, Throw-in Gwangju.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ji-eum Jo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Ji-eum Jo signals a Gwangju throw-in in Jeonbuk's half.
Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Ji-eum Jo blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Can Gwangju get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Jeonbuk's half?
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
Ji-eum Jo signals a Jeonbuk throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 50, Free kick Jeonbuk.
Park Jeong-su for Gwangju has been booked by Ji-eum Jo and receives a first yellow card.
Son Jun-ho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 51, Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Son Jun-ho for Jeonbuk is back on the field again.
Gustavo (Jeonbuk) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Jeonbuk have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
In the minute 55, Gwangju are coming forward and Willyan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball safe as Jeonbuk is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Jeonju.
In the minute 57, Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Free kick Gwangju.
In the minute 60, Jeonbuk awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Jeonbuk.
The away team replace Kim Hyo-gi with Kim Ju-kong.
In the minute 61, Gwangju to take a throw-in in Jeonbuk territory.
Ji-eum Jo signals a throw-in for Gwangju, close to Jeonbuk's area.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Jose Morais (Jeonbuk) is making a first substitution, with Kim Bo-kyung replacing Jo Gue-sung.
Can Jeonbuk capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gwangju's half?
Important block from the Gwangju defence as Kim Bo-kyung fires in a strike for Jeonbuk.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 65, Goal! Kim Bo-kyung extends Jeonbuk's lead to 3-0.
Great play from Gustavo to set up the goal.
Ji-eum Jo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, The away team have replaced Kim Tae-yun with Han Heui-hun. This is the second substitution made today by Park Jin Seob.
Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Gwangju.
Takahiro Kunimoto (Jeonbuk) has received a yellow card from Ji-eum Jo.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for Gwangju in their own half.
Jeonbuk's Kim Bo-kyung gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gwangju defender.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
In the minute 73, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, In Jeonju Jeonbuk attack through Lee Dong-gook. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
Jeonbuk make their second substitution with Lee Dong-gook replacing Gustavo.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk at Jeonju World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 77, Jeonbuk have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kim Jeong-hwan is on a sub for Willyan for Gwangju.
In the minute 79, Jose Morais is making the team's third substitution at Jeonju World Cup Stadium with Han Kyo-won replacing Lee Seung-ki.
In Jeonju a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Ji-eum Jo signals a free kick to Jeonbuk in their own half.
Ji-eum Jo awards Jeonbuk a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeonbuk awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in the half of Gwangju.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Jeonju.
In the minute 86, Gwangju have been awarded a corner by Ji-eum Jo.
Goal! Kim Jeong-hwan pulls one back to make it 3-1.
Choi Jun-hyeok instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 87, Ji-eum Jo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Jeonbuk.
Ji-eum Jo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 89, In Jeonju, Gwangju push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Takahiro Kunimoto (Jeonbuk) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Jeonbuk.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk close to the penalty box.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Jeonbuk in their own half.
That's full-time at Jeonju World Cup Stadium. The final score is 4-1.
It's now 4-1 in Jeonju as Han Kyo-won scores for Jeonbuk.
